column5: Hi all,  someone just posted this on an ice fishing forum i frequent………..I WANT!  http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/06/tech/innovation/underwater-drones/index.html?hpt=hp_bn5
I gotta admit that would be so freakin sweet to have!!
got to agree that is pretty cool. Not sure if I'd get one but I love the idea behind it
I'll take the one with the scope and spear gun option !!
As if youd ever get any fishing done with this on your boat. Id be too busy playing explorer hahaha. Very cool
